query: best hotels in Rome for women travelers
title: Best hotels in Rome for women travelers: Safe, clean, and great amenities
excerpt: Finding hotels in Rome that cater specifically to women travelers can be a daunting task amid the city's vast array of options. This curated list is valuable because it highlights safe, clean accommodations that offer the amenities needed for a comfortable stay, ensuring that women can explore the Eternal City with confidence and peace of mind.
intro: Discover the best hotels in Rome designed with women travelers in mind, featuring top-notch safety, cleanliness, and exceptional amenities.

hotels.name: Hotel Delle Muse
hotels.description: Nestled in the tranquil Parioli District of Rome, Hotel Delle Muse offers comfortable accommodations complete with modern amenities, including air conditioning and flat-screen TVs. Guests can indulge in a delightful daily breakfast buffet in the garden during the summer and enjoy authentic Italian cuisine on the spacious covered terrace. With its prime location just 500 meters from Villa Ada park and close to major attractions, this charming family-run hotel is the perfect peaceful retreat for your Roman getaway.
hotels.highlight: Offers comfortable accommodations with modern amenities, a restaurant, and a garden breakfast buffet in a tranquil setting.

hotels.name: Hotel Ripa Roma
hotels.description: Hotel Ripa Roma offers a modern retreat in the vibrant Trastevere district, just steps away from a tram stop for easy access to Rome's historic center. Guests can enjoy spacious, air-conditioned rooms with amenities like satellite TV and charming balconies, along with the convenience of free WiFi and a complimentary gym. Start your day with a delightful breakfast in your room and treat yourself to a mix of Roman and international dishes at the on-site Ripa Place restaurant.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Ripa Roma boasts spacious, air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi, a complimentary gym, and an on-site restaurant with a vegetarian menu.

hotels.name: Hotel Degli Aranci
hotels.description: Hotel Degli Aranci, located in the elegant Parioli neighborhood of Rome, combines luxurious accommodations with the charm of a 19th-century building and a serene garden filled with orange trees. Guests can indulge in exquisite dining at Il Fiore d'Arancio, where a variety of gourmet dishes are served in a stunning outdoor setting. With easy access to transportation and iconic landmarks just a short walk away, this hotel offers both comfort and convenience for an unforgettable Roman experience.
hotels.highlight: Offers luxurious accommodations, a serene Japanese garden, and exquisite dining in an outdoor setting.

hotels.name: Hotel Maryelen
hotels.description: Hotel Maryelen offers a prime location just a 2-minute stroll from Termini Station, making it easy to access Rome's many attractions. Guests can relax in comfortable en suite rooms equipped with minibars and free Wi-Fi, providing a cozy retreat after a day of exploration. With the iconic Coliseum only a 15-minute walk away, this hotel is perfect for immersing yourself in the rich history of Rome.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Maryelen offers comfortable en suite rooms with minibars, free Wi-Fi, and a shared lounge in a prime location near Termini Station.

hotels.name: Hotel Regina Margherita
hotels.description: Hotel Regina Margherita is ideally located in the vibrant Universit√† district, just steps from Policlinico Metro Station and a short ride from iconic attractions like the Coliseum and Roman Forum. Guests will appreciate the modern air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen TVs, perfect for relaxing after a day of exploring. With easy access to both metro and train services, including links to Fiumicino Airport, your stay promises convenience and comfort in the heart of Rome.
hotels.highlight: Hotel Regina Margherita provides soundproof rooms, a hot tub, and concierge services in a safe and clean environment.

hotels.name: Hotel Corot
hotels.description: Experience modern luxury at Hotel Corot, conveniently located near Roma Termini Station. Enjoy stylish rooms featuring free Wi-Fi, parquet floors, and air conditioning, with select accommodations offering a hydromassage bath for added relaxation. Start your mornings with a delightful breakfast buffet and take advantage of the 24-hour reception for seamless tour bookings and transfers. Book your stay today!
hotels.highlight: Hotel Corot offers soundproof rooms, free Wi-Fi, and a 24-hour reception for convenient tour bookings.
